Update the global theme tokens and base styles used by Tailwind/Shadcn (light + dark mode) so colors, contrast, borders, and backgrounds look premium and consistent across the app.
Improve typography across the site (font choices, scale, line-height, and tracking) and ensure consistent heading/body sizing on key pages (Home, Menu, Checkout, Contact, Orders/Notifications).

Refine layout and visual polish of the main shared UI areas (Header, Footer, Layout container spacing) and key page sections (Home hero/feature cards/CTA, Menu item cards and category tabs, Checkout summary and cart list, Contact cards) to look more modern and “designed”.
